author: Aloisi
title: Diwali Train-Taxi Issues
text: # 1 I am on my first extended trip in India and perhaps stupidly arranged to travel from Ajmer to New Delhi on November 11, arriving at 10:40 pm in order to catch a 3:10 am November 12 international flight back home. I had originally planned to take the airport metro, but now hear that metro hours are curtailed on November 11 because of the holiday. Will there be prepaid taxis readily available on the major holiday? A friend advises me to get off the train at the Delhi Cantt Station and take a taxi to save time. Do experts agree, and will there be prepaid taxis available at the Delhi Cantt Rail Station on that night? Forgive my ignorance; I have tried to research this issue online, without much result.
